concept.title: Attach External References
concept.shortdesc: You can use the following methods to attach xrefs into a drawing:

ul.li: Attach xrefs to the current drawing using XATTACH command.
Start Xref Manager using XREF command, and select the xref to be attached to the cur ent drawing.
Select the xref drawing you want to insert into the drawing from DesignCenter, and right-click the drawing to select Attach Xref.
